Remarks/Remarques: BP established at 0.647m ; observations of control on 2018-09-18 suggest that channel geometry changes at this stage (slightly lower elevation than measurement MGH on this day). A gravel bar becomes exposed at the control riffle and bisects the channel below this stage. No open-water measurements exist below this stage, so the lower rating point was defined using historic marginally ice-affected measurements, and guided by Curve 19.00 and 20.00. The low E grade was assigned below 8.01 cms (breakpoint discharge) since the curve has high uncertainty below this point. Adjusted low E" grade for C21.01 based on 2021-10-14 mmnt."

BP established at 0.647m ; observations of control on 2018-09-18 suggest that channel geometry changes at this stage (slightly lower elevation than measurement MGH on this day). A gravel bar becomes exposed at the control riffle and bisects the channel below this stage. No open-water measurements exist below this stage, so the lower rating point was defined using historic marginally ice-affected measurements, and guided by Curve 19.00 and 20.00. The low E grade was assigned below 8.01 cms (breakpoint discharge) since the curve has high uncertainty below this point.
Cloned curve 19.000 and revised low end and breakpoint based on low end measurements obtained Sept 2018.

Curve developed to replace old compumod curve. Offset applied to fit rating points. Lower end of curve, <20cms is section control, upper end of curve is affected by vertical banks between entrenched channel and flood plain.
APPROVED Shift fm # 17 back to # 15 during ice
